name: Dungeons & Guns
description:
Dungeons & Guns is a pixel art visual, dungeon crawler style game, where the player aims to advance as far as possible through the enemy crowded dungeons, until reaching the final challenge. After this, new challenges will arise.

The project first phase is now available and as the development continues, you will be constantly updated about the game expansion process, until its final release.

Features

  • 30+ enemies;
  • 02 bosses;
  • 11 weapons;
  • 15 items;
  • 02 dungeon themes;
  • Store room;
  • Weapon chest room;
  • Replayability (procedurally generated dungeons);
  • Lightning System.

Controls


Movements: W A S D;
Dash: Space;
Shoot: Left mouse button;
Reload: R;
Change weapon: Tab;
Interact: E;
Open/close mini-map: M;
Pause: Esc.
